Container.Name: HandBrake
Container.Overview: HandBrake is a tool for converting video from nearly any format to a selection of modern, widely supported codecs.[br][br]The graphical user interface (GUI) is accessible through a modern web browser or via any VNC client. A fully automated mode is also available: drop files into a watch folder and let HandBrake process them without any user interaction. Also, being based on Alpine Linux, size of this container is very small (less than 80MB in download size).

Config.Name: Config Directory
Config.Description: This is where HandBrake stores its configuration, log and any files needing persistency.<br> Container path: /config

Config.Name: Storage
Config.Description: This is where video files to be converted are located.<br> Container path: /storage

Config.Name: Output Directory
Config.Description: This is the default output folder for converted videos. Also used by the automatic video converter.<br> Container path: /output

Config.Name: Watch Directory
Config.Description: This is the watch folder of the automatic video converter. Any video copied into this folder will be automatically converted by HandBrake.<br> Container path: /watch

Config.Name: Display Width
Config.Description: Width, in pixels, of HandBrake's application window.

Config.Name: Display Height
Config.Description: Height, in pixels, of HandBrake's application window.

Config.Name: User ID
Config.Description: ID of the user HandBrake runs as.

Config.Name: Group ID
Config.Description: ID of the group HandBrake runs as.

Config.Name: Niceness (priority)
Config.Description: Priority at which HandBrake should run. A niceness value of −20 is the highest priority and 19 is the lowest priority.<br> <b>NOTE:</b> Setting a negative value requires additional permissions. Thus, <i><b>--cap-add=SYS_NICE</b></i> must be added in <i>Extra Parameters</i> (shown when <i>Advanced View</i> is enabled).

Config.Name: Automatic Video Converter Preset
Config.Description: Preset used by the automatic video converter. Name of all available presets can be seen via the HandBrake GUI.

Config.Name: Automatic Video Converter Format
Config.Description: Video container format used by the automatic video converter for output files. This is typically the video filename extension.

Config.Name: Automatic Video Converter Source File Removal
Config.Description: Set to 0 to remove successfully converted videos from the watch folder, 1 to keep them.

Config.Name: Automatic Video Converter Source File Stable Time
Config.Description: Time during which properties (e.g. size, time, etc) of a video file in the watch folder need to remain the same. This is to avoid processing a file that is being copied.

Config.Name: WEB Port for GUI
Config.Description: Port used to access the HandBrake GUI with a web browser.

Config.Name: VNC Port for GUI
Config.Description: Port used to access the HandBrake GUI with VNC client.<br> Make sure this port is equal to the WEB GUI port + 100.
